text.autoconfig.magna.option.highlightAi: Whether an extended hitbox should show air blocks (or other blocks without hitboxes).
text.autoconfig.magna.option.fullBlockSh: Whether non-full blocks (stairs, slabs) should be represented by a full cube in extended hitboxes.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.enableExten: Whether extended hitboxes should be enabled for the appropriate tools.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.enableAllBl: Whether block breaking should show animation on all blocks.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.disableExte: Whether extended hitboxes should be disabled when the player is sneaking.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.breakSingle: Whether only a single block should be disabled when the player is sneaking.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.individualB: Whether each block in an extended hitbox should show its outline separately.
text.autoconfig.magna.option.CurseOfGiga: Maximum level of Curse of Gigantism enchantment
text.autoconfig.magna.title: Magna Config
enchantment.magna.gigantism_curse.desc: Grants a larger Hammer break radius at the cost of mining speed.
